We prioritize creating a Safe Environment Where Students and Faculty Across the United States can Network Without Fear While Ride Sharing.

Drivers Earn Money and Riders Save Money While Carpooling.

Safe

An atmosphere of safety during every trip taken through us

Convenient

Easily sign up for rides using our simple user interface

Network

Connect with students and faculty across the country

Safe

An atmosphere of safety during every trip taken through us

Convenient

Network
Connect with students and faculty across the country

Take a Glance Through the App

  • User Friendly
  • Where to?
  • Safety is Key
  • Your Drive, Your Way

Easy to Use

Effortlessly navigate our app to find your next ride, create a drive, contact those you're riding or driving with, complete safety checks, or even browse to find your next adventure.

World is Your Limit

With Vector Rideshare, you're in control. Choose your destination, date of departure, and driver to ride with.

Safety Checks

Be sure of safety with Vector Rideshare safety measures. We put all of our drivers through extensive safety screenings, including our tri-vet system.

Both riders and drivers must complete all safety checks before riding or driving with Vector Rideshare, so you can go with confidence.

Your Next Drive Will be Your Best Drive

Creating a drive is easy with Vector Rideshare. Just let us know where you're going, and you'll make money for a trip you were already taking. Customize your drive to ensure it's up to your specifications.

Safety at Vector Rideshare

At Vector, the safety of our riders and drivers is our highest priority. Check out all the ways we're bringing integrity and safety back to Ride Sharing.

Only .Edu

Only .edu means that only people with a .edu email address can access the site. Our app features a closed network, further securing your data and privacy. This means that all users, including drivers, will be students, parents or trusted faculty, helping ensure the safety of our app.​

Social Media Integration

Drivers not only have a profile on our site, but are required to post links to their social media accounts before taking any rides with Vector. We also have messaging available on our app, so that Vectoreans can talk to prospective drivers to see what they’re like. ​

Tri-Vet Security System

We ensure our riders’ safety through a tri-vet security screening, incorporating social media integration and driving records checks. Vectoreans can relax knowing their drivers have been fully vetted by our staff.

Public Drop-offs

All of our rides end in a populated, public transit area where it’s easy to get to your final destination. These places include train and bus stations, as well as city centers.

Vector Cares!

We’re more than just a ridesharing company. We care about our users and want you to be a part of the Vector Rideshare Community. Take a look at some of the campaigns we’ve been working on to bring each other closer together.

Drive for a Cause!

15% of our profits will be donated to the cause of your choice on a per-ride basis

Earth Day Campaign

Go green with us as we celebrate Earth Day! We prioritize environment protection and hope you take a step too

Corona Chronicles

Vector Rideshare is here for you during these unprecedented times. We asked Vectoreans about their experiences and want you to share too.

Testimonials

“Vector Rideshare is more than an app or a ride sharing business. It’s changing the way we move and connect universities across the country.”
Doug Chen-Young
Risk Manager
“My hope is that each college student that takes a trip using Vector Rideshare can fully experience our efforts to be more than a ridesharing app.”
Nehemiah Stewart
Founder

“[Vector Rideshare] is such an easy way to make money and safely meet new people.”


Haleigh Glenn
Student
